alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 12:53PM MDT until July 13 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 1253 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Cope, or 17 miles north of Seibert, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Kit Carson County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
